TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ApplicationSettingsBase extends System.Configuration.SettingsBase implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public MustInherit Class ApplicationSettingsBase Inherits SettingsBase Implements INotifyPropertyChanged
public ref class ApplicationSettingsBase abstract : System::Configuration::SettingsBase, System::ComponentModel::INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 作为派生具体包装类以实现 Window 窗体应用程序中的应用程序设置功能的基类。

span.span: Acts as a base class for deriving concrete wrapper classes to implement the application settings feature in Window Forms applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加了以下功能类，基于 Web 的应用程序使用： adds the following functionality to the class, which is used by Web-based applications: - 检测的派生，设置包装类上的属性的能力。The ability to detect attributes on a derived, settings wrapper class. 支持用于包装类属性的声明性模型，如下文所述。 supports the declarative model used for wrapper class properties, as described later. - 更高级别的和方法。Higher-level and methods. - 你可以处理以确保各个设置的正确性的更多的验证事件。Additional validation events that you can handle to ensure the correctness of individual settings. 在应用程序设置体系结构中，若要访问一组设置属性需要派生从一个具体的包装类。In the application settings architecture, to access a group of settings properties you need to derive a concrete wrapper class from . 包装类自定义通过以下方式：The wrapper class customizes in the following ways: - 若要访问每个设置属性，相应的强类型化公共属性添加到包装类。For every settings property to be accessed, a corresponding strongly typed public property is added to the wrapper class. 此属性具有`get`和`set`读/写应用程序设置，但仅的访问器`get`只读设置的访问器。This property has `get` and `set` accessors for read/write application settings, but only a `get` accessor for read-only settings. - 相应的特性必须应用于包装器类的公共属性，以指示是否设置应支持漫游的默认值的设置属性设置的作用域 （应用程序或用户），如特征设置，设置提供程序使用，依次类推。Appropriated attributes must be applied to the wrapper class's public properties to indicate characteristics of the settings property, such as the setting's scope (application or user), whether the setting should support roaming, the default value for the setting, the settings provider to be used, and so on. 每个属性必须以指定其作用域，使用或。Each property is required to specify its scope, using either or . 应用程序范围设置是只读的如果默认值使用。Application-scoped settings are read-only if the default is used. 类使用反射来在运行时检测这些属性。The class uses reflection to detect these attributes at run time. 大部分此信息传递到设置提供程序层，它负责存储和持久性格式等。Most of this information gets passed to the settings provider layer, which is responsible for storage, persistence format, and so on. 当应用程序有多个设置包装类时，每个类定义*设置组*。When an application has multiple settings wrapper classes, each class defines a *settings group*. 每个组具有以下特征：Each group has the following characteristics: - 一个组可以包含任意数量或类型的属性设置。A group can contain any number or type of property settings. - 如果组名称的修饰具有的包装类未显式设置，则会自动生成名称。If the group name is not explicitly set by the decorating the wrapper class with a , then a name is automatically generated. 默认情况下，所有基于客户端的应用程序使用提供存储。By default, all client-based applications use the to provide storage. 如果需要备用的设置提供程序，则必须使用相应修饰的包装器类或属性。If an alternate settings provider is desired, then the wrapper class or property must be decorated with a corresponding . 有关使用应用程序设置的详细信息，请参阅[应用程序设置 Windows 窗体](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md)。For more information about using application settings, see [Application Settings for Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将应用程序设置保持主窗体的以下属性： 位置、 大小、 背景色和标题栏文本。The following code example demonstrates the use of application settings to persist the following attributes of the main form: location, size, background color, and title bar text. 所有这些属性将保留为中的单个应用程序设置属性`FormSettings`名为的类`FormLocation`， `FormSize`，`FormBackColor`和`FormText`分别。All of these attributes are persisted as single application settings properties in the `FormSettings` class, named `FormLocation`, `FormSize`, `FormBackColor` and `FormText`, respectively. 除之外的所有`FormText`和`Size`是数据绑定到其关联的表单的属性和设置值应用使用的默认。All except for `FormText` and `Size` are data bound to their associated form properties and have a default setting value applied using . 包含四个具有以下名称和函数的子控件的窗体：The form contains four child controls that have the following names and functions: - 名为的按钮`btnBackColor`用来显示**颜色**通用对话框。A button named `btnBackColor` used to display the **Color** common dialog box. - 名为的按钮`btnReload`用于应用程序设置。A button named `btnReload` used to the application settings. - 名为的按钮`btnReset`用于应用程序设置。A button named `btnReset` used to the application settings. - 文本框中，名为`tbStatus`用于显示有关此计划的状态信息。A textbox named `tbStatus` used to display status information about the program. 请注意，在应用程序每次执行后，附加的句点字符追加到该窗体的标题文本。Notice that after every execution of the application, an additional period character is appended to the title text of the form. 此代码示例要求的窗体具有类名为`colorDialog1`，和一个控件替换为名为`tbStatus`。This code example requires a Form with a class named `colorDialog1`, and a control with a named `tbStatus`. 此外，它需要三个对象命名的`btnReload`， `btnReset`，和`btnBackColor`。Additionally, it requires three objects named `btnReload`, `btnReset`, and `btnBackColor`. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的实例。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 将 类的实例初始化为其默认状态。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class to its default state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数已用于假定没有与当前的设置包装类，该类派生自关联的组件不处理。The default constructor was designed to work under the assumption that there is no component associated with the current settings wrapper class, which derives from . 创建包装器类的实例时, 继承的代码将自动执行以下操作：When an instance of a wrapper class is created, inherited code will automatically perform the following actions: 1. 通过类进行反射。Reflect over the class. 2. 对于在包装上的每个属性标记使用`[UserScopedSettingAttribute]`或`[ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute]`，相应创建。For each property on the wrapper marked with either `[UserScopedSettingAttribute]` or `[ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute]`, a corresponding is created. 3. 每个具有某些组件 （可选） 位于包装器的属性，例如默认值或设置提供程序的其他属性对基于其属性集。Each has some of its properties set based on other attributes that are optionally present on the wrapper's properties, such as the default value or the settings provider. 4. 所有其他特性只被放置到一个属性包，属性类。All other attributes are simply put into an attribute bag, the property of the class. 5. 所有对象添加到由属性类。All objects are added to a represented by the property of the class. 然后将此集合传递给方法。This collection is then passed to the method. 步骤 3 前面提到，通过为隐含本机适用于多个属性特性，即： ， ，和。As implied by step 3 mentioned previously, natively works with several property attributes, specifically the following: , , and . 所有其他设置特性直接传递到相应的基础提供程序。All other settings attributes are simply passed through to the appropriate underlying provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在完全等同于使用调用的构造函数：This constructor is exactly equivalent to the constructor using the invocation: `ApplicationSettingsBase(owner, String.Empty)` 有关如何在一个包装类的实例化期间使用反射的信息，请参阅默认构造函数。For information about how reflection is used during the instantiation of a wrapper class, see the default constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性的值`settingsKey`参数。This constructor initializes the property to the value of the `settingsKey` parameter. 此属性可消除歧义相同的应用程序域中的设置包装器类的不同实例中。This property is useful in disambiguating different instances of the settings wrapper class in the same application domain. 有关如何在一个包装类的实例化期间使用反射的信息，请参阅默认构造函数。For information about how reflection is used during the instantiation of a wrapper class, see the default constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定对象`owner`参数充当此应用程序设置类的当前实例的所有者。The object specified by the `owner` parameter acts as the owner of the current instance of this applications settings class. 包装类派生自的设置在初始化期间，查询所有者的站点来搜索。During the initialization of the settings wrapper class derived from , the owner's site is queried for a . 如果存在，它优先使用本机设置提供程序的所有属性的包装器类，按指定。If one exists, it is used in preference to native settings provider for all the properties of the wrapper class, as specified by the . 此构造函数初始化属性的值`settingsKey`参数。This constructor initializes the property to the value of the `settingsKey` parameter. 此属性可消除歧义的包装类相同的应用程序域中的不同实例中。This property is useful in disambiguating different instances of the wrapper class in the same application domain. 有关如何在一个包装类的实例化期间使用反射的信息，请参阅默认构造函数。For information about how reflection is used during the instantiation of a wrapper class, see the default constructor.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Context As SettingsContext
public: virtual property System::Configuration::SettingsContext ^ Context { System::Configuration::SettingsContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与设置组关联的应用程序设置上下文。

span.span: Gets the application settings context associated with the settings group.
A associated with the settings group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个设置包装类派生自具有与之关联的上下文。Each settings wrapper class derived from has a context associated with it. 该上下文传递到设置提供程序的每个属性，来确定如何使用属性中。The context is passed to the settings provider for each property to identify how the property is used. 上下文因此充当提示来帮助确定如何最大程度地保留关联的应用程序的设置值的设置提供程序。Context therefore acts as a hint to help the settings provider determine how best to persist the associated application settings values. 与此相反，属性启用要消除歧义的同一个包装类的多个实例的设置提供程序。In contrast, the property enables the settings provider to disambiguate multiple instances of the same wrapper class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，也称为的索引器，用于定期包装类派生自的设置。The property, also known as the indexer, is routinely used in the settings wrapper class derived from . 将包装器类的公共属性绑定到相应的设置属性。 binds the public property of the wrapper class to the corresponding settings property. 引发多个事件，具体取决于所执行的操作： raises several events depending on the operation being performed: - 检索一个属性时，第一次引发事件。The first time a property is retrieved, the event is raised. - 当设置一个属性时，引发事件。When a property is set, the event is raised. 如果处理程序不会取消该事件，则设置的属性值和引发事件。If the handler does not cancel the event, then the property value is set and the event is raised.

exception.span: 没有与当前包装关联的属性，或者未能找到指定的属性。

span.span: There are no properties associated with the current wrapper or the specified property could not be found.
An attempt was made to set a read-only property.

exception.span: 在设置操作期间，所提供值的类型与设置属性不兼容。

span.span: The value supplied is of a type incompatible with the settings property, during a set operation.
The configuration file could not be parsed.

span.span: The source of the event.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As SettingsPropertyCollection

summary.span: 获取包装中的设置属性的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of settings properties in the wrapper.

value.span: 一个 ，包含当前包装中使用的所有 对象。

span.span: A containing all the objects used in the current wrapper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `get`的访问器设置包装器类，该类派生自的元数据属性反映，可以动态确定的一组可用的应用程序设置属性。The `get` accessor of the property reflects over the metadata of the settings wrapper class, which is derived from , to dynamically determine the set of available application settings properties. 类本身可以识别的一个应用程序设置，例如其名称、 属性类型、 设置提供程序、 默认值，某些特征读取仅有状态和序列化首选项。The class natively recognizes certain characteristics of an application setting, such as its name, property type, settings provider, default value, read only status, and a serialization preference. 这些特征被映射中的属性为类。These characteristics are mirrored as properties in the class. 设置属性的所有其他特性只需将传递到其关联的设置提供程序所造成。All other attributes of the settings property are just passed through to its associated settings provider.

exception.span: 未能找到关联的设置提供程序，或者其实例化失败。

span.span: The associated settings provider could not be found or its instantiation failed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PropertyChanged As PropertyChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 发生在更改应用程序设置属性的值之后。

span.span: Occurs after the value of an application settings property is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过更改设置属性时将引发事件`set`的访问器方法，或到进行调用时，将还原每个属性或方法。The event is raised when a settings property is changed through the `set` accessor of the method, or for every property that is restored when a call is made to the or methods. 没有对应的`PropertyChanging`事件此类; 相反，请参阅事件。There is no corresponding `PropertyChanging` event for this class; instead, see the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定哪些设置使用提供程序设置包装类或单个设置的属性。The determines what setting provider is used by a settings wrapper class or an individual setting property. 如果未指定此属性，客户端应用程序将使用。If this attribute is not specified, a client application will use the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reload() cil managed

summary.span: 从永久存储刷新应用程序设置属性值。

span.span: Refreshes the application settings property values from persistent storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法清除当前已缓存的属性值，用户随后访问时，从持久性存储区导致重新加载这些值。The method clears the currently cached property values, causing a reload of these values from persistent storage when they are subsequently accessed. 此方法执行下列操作：This method performs the following actions: - 它通过清除表示该集合将清除当前已缓存的属性属性。It clears the currently cached properties by clearing the collection represented by the property. - 它会发出事件的每个成员集合。It raises the event for every member of the collection. 将与进行比较在于前者将加载最后一组已保存应用程序设置值，而后者将加载保存的默认值。 contrasts with in that the former will load the last set of saved application settings values, whereas the latter will load the saved default values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的正文中正在调用名为的按钮的事件处理程序`btnReload`。The following code example shows the method being invoked in the body of the event handler for a button named `btnReload`. 进行此调用后，应用程序设置的当前存储的值被重新加载到其对应的属性。As a result of this call, the currently stored values for the application settings are reloaded into their corresponding properties. 完整的代码示例所示类概述。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#6)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 将保持的应用程序设置值还原为其对应的默认属性。

span.span: Restores the persisted application settings values to their corresponding default properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法还原每个应用程序设置的当前保留的值将覆盖用户范围的设置属性。The method overwrites the user-scoped settings properties by restoring the currently persisted value of each application settings. 此方法执行下列操作：This method performs the following actions: - 它调用上支持此可选方法每个设置提供程序的方法。It calls the method on every settings provider that supports this optional method. - 它调用方法来强制进行刷新的设置属性值。It calls the method to force a refresh of the settings property values. 将与进行比较在于前者将加载最后一组已保存应用程序设置值，而后者将加载保存的默认值。 contrasts with in that the former will load the last set of saved application settings values, whereas the latter will load the saved default values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的正文中正在调用名为的按钮的事件处理程序`btnReset`。The following code example shows the method being invoked in the body of the event handler for a button named `btnReset`. 进行此调用后，应用程序设置的存储的默认值将被重新加载到其对应的属性中。As a result of this call, the stored default values for the application settings are reloaded into their corresponding properties. 完整的代码示例所示类概述。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#5)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

span.span: The configuration file could not be parsed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Save() cil managed

summary.span: 存储应用程序设置属性的当前值。

span.span: Stores the current values of the application settings properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将写入其关联的数据存储的每个设置属性的当前值。The method writes the current value of each settings property to its associated data store. 对于每个属性，此方法调用在关联的设置提供程序上的方法。For each property, this method calls the method on the associated settings provider. 此方法与不同的基类实现的它会发出事件之前写入值。This method differs from the base class implementation in that it raises the event before the values are written. 如果定义的唯一设置应用程序范围的设置，将有任何效果，且不返回任何错误，如果使用默认值调用。If the only settings defined are application-scoped settings, will have no effect and return no error if called with the default . 仅保存用户范围的设置。 only saves user-scoped settings. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因为包装器类初始化过程中自动加载的应用程序设置的值没有相应负载方法。There is no corresponding Load method because the values of application settings are automatically loaded during wrapper class initialization. 与此相反，这些值将不自动保存应用程序结束时。In contrast, these values are not automatically saved when an application ends. 因此，你必须明确地调用方法来保持应用程序设置的当前值。Therefore, you must explicitly call the method to persist the current values of the application settings. 通常在执行此操作事件处理程序的主或包含。This is typically performed in the event handler of the primary or containing . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法从调用的主窗体的事件处理程序。The following code example shows the method being called from the event handler for the primary form. 此方法还将一个额外的句点追加到与窗体的关联的设置属性属性。This method also appends an extra period to the settings property that is associated with the form's property. 完整的代码示例所示类概述。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SettingChanging As SettingChangingEventHandler

summary.span: 发生在更改应用程序设置属性的值之前。

span.span: Occurs before the value of an application settings property is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生之前通过更改应用程序设置值属性方法。The event occurs before an application setting value property is changed through the method. 此事件不时引发或调用方法。This event is not raised when the or methods are called. 可以通过取消事件数据类。 can be canceled through the event data class. 通常使用要处理的单个设置属性的即时验证事件。You typically use the event to handle immediate validation of an individual settings property. 有关验证的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 验证应用程序设置](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-validate-application-settings.md)。For more information about validation, see [How to: Validate Application Settings](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-validate-application-settings.md). 没有对应的`SettingChanged`事件此类; 相反，请参阅事件。There is no corresponding `SettingChanged` event for this class; instead, see the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件处理程序类型的对象`FormSettings`，后者一个包装类派生自。The following code example shows the event handler for object of type `FormSettings`, which is a wrapper class derived from . 该处理程序中名为文本框中显示的事件信息`tbStatus`。The handler displays the event information in a textbox named `tbStatus`. 完整的代码示例所示类概述。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#7)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SettingsKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序设置组的设置键。

span.span: Gets or sets the settings key for the application settings group.

value.span: 一个 ，包含当前设置组的设置键。

span.span: A containing the settings key for the current settings group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于启用客户端代码，特别设置提供程序，以消除同一个应用程序设置类的多个实例之间的歧义。The property is provided to enable client code, and in particular the settings provider, to disambiguate between multiple instances of the same application settings class. 设置包装类旨在使用单独模式，除非可以有多个单个应用程序中的相同应用程序设置类的实例。Unless the settings wrapper class is designed using the singleton pattern, there can be multiple instances of the same application settings class in a single application. 值应根据属性值如何用于共享设置。The value of should be set according to how the property values are intended to be shared. - 如果打算在同一应用程序，然后在包装的所有实例之间共享的包装的设置属性应具有相同的值中的所有实例。If the settings properties of the wrapper are intended to be shared across all instances of the wrapper in the same application, then should have the same value in all of the instances. 这是默认行为的类。This is the default behavior of the class. - 如果包装的设置属性都应是每个实例，然后应具有每个实例的唯一值。If the settings properties of the wrapper are intended to be per instance, then should have a unique value for every instance. 版本的构造函数可以初始化到唯一的字符串。The version of the constructor enables you to initialize to a unique string. 与此相反，属性提供了对设置提供程序，以使其能够高效且有序方式保留的值的提示。In contrast, the property provides hints to the settings provider to enable it to persist values in an efficient and orderly manner. 类包含类似属性，可帮助标识的源事件。The class contains a similar property that helps identify the source of the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SettingsLoaded As SettingsLoadedEventHandler

summary.span: 在从存储区中检索应用程序设置之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the application settings are retrieved from storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生在初始后才`get`访问第一个配置属性使用，通常通过方法。The event occurs only after the initial `get` access of the first configuration property used, typically through the method. 后续访问使用本地缓存的设置属性的值。Subsequent accesses use values for the settings property that are cached locally. 和方法将清除所有缓存的值，因此将在后续访问属性时再次引发此事件。The and methods will clear all cached values so this event will be raised again upon subsequent property access.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SettingsSaving As SettingsSavingEventHandler

summary.span: 发生在将值保存到数据存储区中之前。

span.span: Occurs before values are saved to the data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件由引发之前它将存储到其关联的数据存储区的应用程序设置属性的方法。The event is raised by the method before it stores the application settings properties to their associated data store. 关联的事件处理程序可以取消此事件。The associated event handler can cancel this event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件处理程序类型的对象`FormSettings`，后者一个包装类派生自。The following code example shows the event handler for object of type `FormSettings`, which is a wrapper class derived from . 处理程序将查询用户将保存当前的应用程序设置属性值。The handler queries the user to save the current application settings property values. 完整的代码示例所示类概述。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#8)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Upgrade() cil managed

summary.span: 更新应用程序设置，以反映最近安装的应用程序。

span.span: Updates application settings to reflect a more recent installation of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将执行两个操作以确保平稳过渡到新版本的应用程序：The method performs two actions to assure smooth transition to a new version of an application: - 它将通过调用升级的应用程序是否存在相应的设置提供程序的所有通知其方法，假定它们实现接口。It notifies all of the corresponding settings providers of the existence of the upgraded application through a call to their method, assuming they have implemented the interface. 如果使用标记的设置包装类，则不会执行此操作。This action is not performed if the settings wrapper class is marked with . - 它将重新加载的所有应用程序设置的值。It reloads the values for all of the application settings. 你可以重写的默认行为实现自定义升级或合并行为。You can override the default behavior of to implement custom upgrading or merging behavior. 使用方法来检索有关以前版本的应用程序的设置的单个值。Use the method to retrieve individual values for a setting for the previous version of the application. 自定义升级行为的示例包括：Examples of custom upgrade behavior include: - 使用重写一个或多个以前的用户指定值的新策略默认值或以前的默认值。Using new policy defaults that override one or more of the previous user-specified values or previous defaults. - 特殊转换后的旧值才能兼容较新范围、 与不同的设置属性组，等等。Special translation of old values to be compatible with newer ranges, a different settings property group, and so on.

span.span: The configuration file could not be parsed.
